titles.title: National Community Garden Grant Program Act of 1993
A bill to establish a National Community Garden Grant Program to promote the prevention and elimination of urban blight and to meet community developmental needs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10107)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 8/2/1993--Introduced. National Community Garden Grant Program Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to award up to 100 community garden program grants. Authorizes appropriations.
